amendment.description: Amendment requires revisions of the cohesive wildland fire management strategy at least once every five years.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-52 to require revisions of the cohesive wildland fire management strategy at least once every five years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis (CO) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Polis (CO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis (CO) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
